doc.title: Untitled Boxer
doc.plot: Alex, an abused African-American teen, runs away and quickly matures while living on the streets, amid a prejudiced society. Alex rekindles an interracial relationship with Lalenia, an old schoolmate, and past girlfriend. As Alex attempts to create a new life, together they decide to conceal Alex's past identity. Alex finds boxing as a source of income & fulfillment and quickly rises to greatness within the sport to become a world-class heavyweight Olympic title contender. The day finally comes for the championship bout. The title is won! Only to be stripped away when someone from Alex's distant past comes into the picture and exposes Alex's true identity. Is every issue really a matter of race...?
